tooltip.thecopperierage.copper_fire_enab: Whether Fire will turn into Cupric Fire when above a Copper block.
tooltip.thecopperierage.copper_fire_pois: Whether Cupric Fire can poison mobs.
tooltip.thecopperierage.copper_particles:
Whether certain particles created by Cupric Fire-related blocks will emit green-tinted particles.
This includes Cupric Fire, Cupric Campfires, and Cupric Torches.
The green tint of smoke-like particles will fade away.
